oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Edmon Keller or Ebmon Keller
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a post-war crayon print of Edmon Keller. He is holding a Colt Revolving Rifle. He was in the Confederate Army. He died in Richmond, Virigina after a stay in the hospitals there. He was born in Watauga County, NC 1832 and died Oct. 7, 1864. He was a member Co. B, 37th N.C. Inf. Regt., CSA. He was wounded at 2nd Bull Run August 29, 1862 and died of pneumonia October 7, 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Keller, Ebmon
